name: VR Adventure (Virtual Reality)
description:
Deep dive in the amazing adventure atmosphere.
Do you think you can escape from the mystical maze full of the evil creatures?

What the game prepared for you:

• Many different creatures.
• Two character classes - Hunter and Sorceress.
• 3 weapon improvements: poison, fire, cold.
• Leveling. Each level grants some weapon or character improvement.
• Comfortable control. You can shoot by a cardboard trigger or by gaze on target.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!!! Warning !!!
- Do not try to play this game without 3D glasses. It is only for virtual reality(vr) devices like Google Cardboard or similar.
